metadata.title: CVE-2022-20158 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In bdi_put and bdi_unregister of backing-dev.c, there is a possible memorycorruption due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-182815710References: Upstream kernel
